title: Industry Director - Automotive
content:
Teads is looking for an Industry Director, Automotive to join our growing Strategic Accounts team in Hamburg. You will be responsible for forging partnerships and driving incremental revenue growth on key accounts
This role offers the opportunity to join an industry pioneer and leader in full funnel advertising solutions, and one that is experiencing rapid Global growth. The Automotive vertical is a critical growth lever and the Industry Director will be tasked with developing existing and new relationships and partnerships with the largest Automotive clients.
Our advertising solutions are bought by many of the world’s largest advertisers including automotive brands and many others.
The Industry Director will also work closely with the Agency Sales team to manage senior level agency relationships. 
Reporting into the Director of Strategic Accounts, this person will be a key part of the senior team developing the #advertiserfirst strategy in the region.
==== Responsibilities =====

Develop and scale collaborative relationships with top Automotive businesses in the region
Be the expert on these Automotive businesses, to deliver solutions to best fit advertiser needs.
You'll ensure that Teads is front of mind with the local client and part of their core media mix; build relations across all key functions, ensure key stakeholders know and understand our proposition and aim to develop a local/regional partnership or fully leverage global partnerships
You'll maximise the client media investment – working closely with the sales team to deliver the numbers locally; ensure Teads is in all Core media plans, activation budgets ie NPD, big events (eg sport) or seasonal opportunities, and new Teads innovation.
You'll share learnings back with global industry director and your peers in other markets 

==== In addition you will ====

Serve as an industry expert in order to drive vertical and client success by developing thought leadership within your vertical(s)
Create and deliver consultative sales presentations using industry knowledge, market trends, and Teads’ full funnel solutions
Drive external and internal market knowledge and insights
Proactive engagement with industry committees and conference

==== Requirements =====

Strong understanding and background in Automotive
Ability to build relationships with top marketing/media decision makers
Perfect fluency in German & English
Proven experience in collaborative to build long term sustainable partnership growth
Excellent communication and presentation skills
Knowledge of online video, display and performance 
Proven leadership ability to influence, develop, and empower colleagues to achieve objectives with a team approach
Ability to convert business from other media channels 

===== ABOUT TEADS ======
Teads operates a leading, cloud-based, omnichannel platform that enables programmatic digital advertising across a global ecosystem of quality digital media.
As an end-to-end solution, Teads’ modular platform allows partners to leverage buy-side, sell-side, creative, data and AI optimization technologies. For advertisers and their agencies, Teads offers a single access point to buy the inventory of many of the world’s best publishers and content providers.
Through exclusive global media partnerships, Teads enables advertisers and agencies to reach billions of unique monthly users in brand safe, responsible advertising environments, while improving the effectiveness and efficiency of digital ad transactions.
Teads partners with the leading marketers, agencies and publishers through a team of 1,200+ people in 50 offices across more than 30 countries.
We're committed to creating a dynamic work environment that values diversity and inclusion, and represents employees across a variety of skill sets. We embrace contributions from all ages, sexes, races, ethnicities, religions, sexual orientations and gender identities. 
 
Please submit you resume in English
